mean_en: an accident in which two vehicles or people crash into each other; a strong disagreement between two people or between opposing ideas, opinions, etc./ the meeting of two things that are very different
sentence: Fortunately, no one was injured in the collision between the cars.
sentence_trans: 幸运的是，没人在两车碰撞中受伤。
word_etyma: colli碰撞 + sion名词后缀 → collision碰撞
